com.palomamobile.android.sdk.friend

Interface IFriendService


  • public interface IFriendService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Friend Service RESTful API. All calls are synchronous. To get a concrete implementation of this interface call IServiceManager.getService() This class provides somewhat low level access to the Server API it may be more convenient to use methods in IFriendManager.
    See Also:
    Paloma Mobile Platform Friend Service RESTful API
